page.title: 18Sawbridgeworth- Health
page.content: The{doctor's surgery}is in Bell Street.There are four doctors who regularly work there.If you are ill,you phone up to make an appointment to see the doctor.He will have a look at you and may give you a prescription which you take to one of the two chemists to get your medicine.If you are seriously ill,he might send you to{hospital}at Harlow or Bishop's Stortford,and if necessary you will be kept there until you are better.In the same grounds as the surgery there is a clinic where old people and young children are treated.In attendance there are doctors and health visitors and sometimes a chiropodist.Next door there is a kitchen where "Meals on Wheels" are cooked for old people.Two dentists share the same surgery in the square.
